name: Pancreatic Cyst on CT
description: Pancreatic cyst categorization on computerized tomography.

attributes.name: Density
attributes.description: If a pancreatic lesion is present then determine density in Hounsfield units.

attributes.name: Categorization
attributes.description: Categorization of cyst if lesion attenuation is less than or equal to 20 HU, categorization as undetermined if lesion attenuation is 21-29 HU, and categorized as solid if lesion attenuation is greater than or equal to 30 HU.

attributes.name: Pancreatic duct dilation
attributes.description: Detection of dilated MPD greater than or equal to 10 mm

attributes.name: Solid component
attributes.description: Detection of solid components in the cyst

attributes.name: Peripheral calcification
attributes.description: Detection of Peripheral calcifications components in the cyst

attributes.name: Wall thickening
attributes.description: Detection of wall thickening in the cyst

attributes.name: Size
attributes.description: If a pancreatic lesion is present then determine maximal size measurement.
